resources:
PrivaDroid
Agree to terms above Continue Submit Terms
PrivaDroid is a community-based Android study app. It helps you keep track of the applications you install/remove from your device. In addition, it captures the permission change you make. Joined users will form a community and users can see how other users are join the app. The data is stored safely and will not be used for any commercial purpose. Users are encouraged to answer the demographic questions to help us better understand how users use Android.
Skip Start Set up OK Done
How to use?
App Install shows a list of apps that were installed after PrivaDroid was installed. Similarly, App Uninstall tab shows a list of apps that were uninstalled. Permission screen contains the grants/denys you gave to permission requests. Community shows an aggregated data from all users of this app. You can view your Advertisement ID and other information in the Profile tab.
Accessibility Service
Accessibility Service is required and used when the app needs to read the permission name and whether you grant/deny the permission request from an app. For example, Camera app requests Location access to you through a dialog and PrivaDroid will read the permission requested (Location) and whether you granted/denied it (Allow/Deny).
This permission is needed for PrivaDroid to be able to read permission name on the screen and detect click events when granting/denying permission requests.
App Usage Access
Usage access allows PrivaDroid to track what other apps you are using and how often, as well as your carrier, language settings, and other details.
Community Permission App Uninstall App Install Profile

1. Why did you uninstall the app?
Select an option
I no longer use the app
To free up space or speed up my device
I didn\’t like the app
The app is not working as expected
The app is crashing/very slow
Because of advertisements in the app
Because of in-app purchases
The app required permissions I wasn\’t comfortable granting
I don\’t know
None of the above

1. Why did you install the app?
Select an option

The app is useful
The app is part of a product/service I use
The app is cool or fun to use
I trust the app or the company making the app
My friends/family use it
It was the only app of its kind (no other apps provide the same functionality)
I was required to install it
I was offered something in return (e.g. credits, monetary rewards, discount)
The app has fewer permissions than other apps like it
I don’t know
None of the above
